module.name: CustomerService
module.description:
version: '3'
services: service: image: awinta-docker.intra.vsa.de/noventi.cm/commonModuleService:0.1-SNAPSHOT ports: - "8002:8002" networks: default: external: name: cm # create a network with 'docker network create cm'

module.name: Customer Service with Ui
module.description:
version: '3'
services: ui: image: awinta-docker.intra.vsa.de/noventi.cm/commonModuleUi:0.1-SNAPSHOT ports: - "8003:8003"
networks: default: external: name: cm # create a network with 'docker network create cm'
